puzzle.title: Entrance Exam
puzzle.hint: Question 37 in the Placement Test has a grid with coordinates. Use the part of questions 1-36 in parentheses to fill in the coordinates. For example, the end of question 5 is (D2), which can be matched to a coordinate.

In question 1, parenthetical instructions are (+1, F4), and the solution is A. If you treat letters as numbers A = 1. Following the parenthetical instructions, add 1+1, translate back to letters, and then fill that information into place F4 on the grid.
The solution is MCMENAMINS KENNEDY SCHOOL BOILER ROOM BAR
